faq.question: How do I book an appointment?
faq.answer: You can book online through our website 24/7, call us on 0432588164 during business hours, or send us a message on social media.

faq.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faq.answer: We require 24 hours notice for cancellations or rescheduling. Late cancellations may incur a fee. We understand emergencies happen and will always work with you.

faq.question: Do you offer free consultations?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer complimentary consultations for all our services. This helps us understand your needs and provide an accurate quote.

faq.question: What areas do you service?
faq.answer: We primarily service Sydney, Sydney, and surrounding areas within QLD. Contact us to confirm we cover your location.

faq.question: Is parking available?
faq.answer: Yes! Free parking is available near our location. There's also street parking and public transport options nearby.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept all major credit cards, EFTPOS, bank transfer, and cash. Payment plans may be available for larger services.

faq.question: Are you licensed and insured?
faq.answer: Yes, we are fully licensed and insured. All our team members hold current certifications and undergo regular training.

faq.question: Do you offer warranties on your work?
faq.answer: Yes! We stand behind our work with satisfaction guarantees and warranties on applicable services. Ask us for details.

about.title: Sydney's Most Trusted Security Installations Since 2021
about.story: At AJH Safety Solutions, we specialise in comprehensive security systems to keep your home safe and secure. Our mission is clear: to provide affordable, high-quality security services with prompt delivery. We specialise in crafting personalised solutions for your home, focusing keenly on your specific needs and financial considerations. We provide tailored solutions, commitment to quality with high-quality equipment backed by manufacturer warranties, and prioritize customer satisfaction. Fully licensed, qualified and insured with NSW Master License 000106338.
about.mission: Our mission is to deliver exceptional security installations services in a welcoming environment, using sustainable practices and premium products.

values.title: Excellence

values.title: Honesty

values.title: Reliability
values.description: We're committed to showing up on time, every time, and delivering on our promises.
